positions.title: SPAC Information Technology Inc.
responsilibilities: Understand, interpret, and clarify functional requirements as well as technical requirements for product features.
Work with Product Management and Engineering Leadership to implement software to specification.
Collaborate and contribute to architecture and design decisions driving product direction.
Support applications all the way to production.

positions.title: Java Developer/Support
responsilibilities: Resolve incidents and problem tickets as reported by the client team.
Proactively manage the maintenance of the infrastructure/technology For Java
Coordinate with cross-functional and cross-technical groups in the completion of maintenance or project activities.
Apply configuration changes and required patches based on approved requirements and specifications.
Implement provisioning requests as required by the client or based on project plans.
Perform quality assurance activities for the technologies being managed.
Apply client-pecific methods and tools for carrying out any support or project deliverables.

positions.title: Software Developer II
responsilibilities: Developed and deployed multiple ethereum smart contracts (ERC-721) to a third-party RPC provider using Solidity.
Built APIs in a microservices architecture using Express.js and Quarkus, a Kubernetes native Java framework.
Utilized Azure Key Vault for building APIs with database data encryption and decryption using Express.js, and Django REST

positions.title: Software Developer I
responsilibilities: Built and deployed a native Java desktop application to the Microsoft Store.
Developed an automated trading bot that is integrated with the APIs of multiple crypto exchanges using Laravel.
Conducted market-making on multiple market pairs within several crypto exchanges.
Collaborated with a Huawei sales/marketing representative on the configuration and integration of Huawei Cloud's Object Storage Solution.
Built an API collection which analyzes, evaluates, and verifies user-submitted documents using Express.js, MongoDB, and Google Vision API.
Integrated several third-party storage and payment solutions such as Dropbox, PayPal, and DragonPay using Laravel.
Worked overseas with a foreign team on the Philippine Identification System's Iris and Face capture device API using C#.

positions.title: Firmware Quality Assurance Intern
responsilibilities: Maintain the FW revisions and statuses of multiple prototype printers.
Deliver daily performance reports, updates, and breakdowns on prototype printers.
Conduct weekly and monthly office supply and equipment inventory.
Worked with different FW QA and FW development teams that are delegated to specific printer components and features.
Perform specific QA test procedures on several prototype printer components and features.
Organize and report different stable and failed builds from FW developer teams using Jenkins
Transport multiple types of prototype printers to and from different teams.
Built two internal tools to further enhance the productivity of upcoming interns.
